name: Finska
description:
The addictive log-tossing game from Finland

Objective
Be the first team to reach EXACTLY 50 points by knocking down the numbered pins.

Number of players
From 2 to 100 players. Each match is contested between two teams.

1. Start a New Game by adding Player / Team names. You can auto import players names from your contacts or add existing players. Once all names are entered start the game

2. Keep track of the score by selecting the name then selecting the points. The app will automatically add up the scores,keep track of player order and player rank

3. The app will automatically detect if a team gets three 0 in a row and knock them out. Or revert the score back to 25 if a player goes over 50.
